H3.text: where is the illinois river on a map. Illinois

A4.text: The Illinois River's drainage basin extends into northwestern Indiana and a very small area of southwestern Michigan.

A5.text: The Illinois River is located in the U.S. state of Illinois.

A6.text: The Illinois River bisects the state northeast to southwest.
